## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                                 | Type       | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------- | ----------- |
| `customId`    | `custom-id`    | The custom id                                                               | `string`   | `undefined` |
| `customValue` | `custom-value` | The custom value                                                            | `any`      | `null`      |
| `debug`       | `debug`        | The debug state This will show a pre tag in the HTML to visualize the value | `boolean`  | `true`      |
| `label`       | `label`        | The label name                                                              | `string`   | `undefined` |
| `values`      | --             | The values                                                                  | `string[]` | `undefined` |

## Events

| Event          | Description | Type                   |
| -------------- | ----------- | ---------------------- |
| `toggleChange` |             | `CustomEvent<boolean>` |
